name: Pools Closed
description:
Pools Closed is Soulcube’s second ever game, and our second entry in the Annual Australian Stem Video Game Challenge (A local straya wide game dev competition for school students). It was also a product of 2 months of game dev experimentation and absolute CRUNCH. 

It is a tower defense game that borrows elements from auto chess games such as TFT, and mashes it all into one game. You play as the pool manager recruiting workers with red frogs to defend the pool from pesky kids tryna break in!
